traits.Rejuvenation: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15+1d8 + 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.Spit Poison: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. Hit: The target must make a DC 15+1d8 + 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
